Title: Qur’an Memorization (Intensive Memorization Program)
Subtitle: Rapid & Structured Qur’an Memorization with Correct Tajwīd

FAQ.Question: Is this only for advanced learners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is suitable for learners with basic reading skills ready for focused memorization.

FAQ.Question: Can I start if I’m not fluent yet?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course combines recitation practice with memorization techniques.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult during intensive memorization?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is reinforced through guided repetition and practice.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to memorize efficiently on my own?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Intensive training prepares students for independent memorization.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With patient guidance, structured review, and repeated correction — never pressure.
